content.rendered: Customer Reviews:  4.1 out of 5 stars    89 ratings

excerpt.rendered:
Ovahope is scientifically formulated with clinically proven natural ingredient for effective management of PCOD / PCOS & PMS-PMDD which is highly common in today’s women.
MYO & DCI in effective 40:1 Ratio, which are first line management of PCOS/ PCOD. Additionally MYOINOSITOL is selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor-like role for myo-inositol, likely due to the fact that myo-inositol is the second messenger of serotonin, which is vital for management of PMS symptoms. Ovahope helps in reducing acne, weight , excessive hair (hirsutism), reducing sugar cravings, improve mood levels, reduce androgens.
